text: RT @tgradous One tweet caught the attention of Sen. Ted Cruz (R-TX), leading the staunch conservative statesman to compare CNN to the parody site The Onion as well as calling their stories “Iranian Pravda.”  https://townhall.com/tipsheet/timothymeads/2017/12/30/ted-cruz-calls-out-cnns-iranian-pravda-n2428522

RT @SenTedCruz VIDEO: Another incredible year fighting for Texans http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/946072713076109313/pu/img/U9KKz15LCBMcuRfk.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/946072713076109313/pu/vid/320x180/2pUmTXIcBwNkfxAi.mp4

It is the right of all people to speak out against their government. The government of Iran should respect this right and heed the voices of thousands of Iranians who are demonstrating across the country for better opportunities and a better future.

2017 was a trying year for so many, but I am greatly encouraged by the activism and enthusiasm I’ve seen. From people who marched in the streets to those who made phone calls and more, we showed the power of the people. Let’s keep it up. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DSY5MKCUQAAwBeC.jpg

My VA legislation, signed by President Trump, ends protections for bad employees at the VA. Florida is home to thousands of veterans, and this law makes significant progress towards giving them the care they deserve. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DSY1wYpUMAAk2xv.jpg

Saddened to hear of the passing of activist Erica Garner. Keeping her family in our prayers during this difficult time. May we all continue her fight for social justice.

As San Francisco’s District Attorney and CA’s Attorney General, I helped make California the first state to outlaw the “gay/trans panic” defense. I am proud that Illinois is joining California in ending this reprehensible defense and am hopeful other states will follow suit. https://twitter.com/latimes/status/946839522083528704 QT @latimes LGBTQ advocates rally to end "gay panic" defense http://www.latimes.com/nation/la-na-lgbtq-gay-panic-defense-20171228-story.html http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DSPZhtTWsAAKWzQ.jpg

RT @leezeldin Millions of Iranians are desperate for peace, stability, democracy & regime change. Much love from US to those rising up in #IranProtest
Across all communities, we must stand together, arm-in-arm in the new year. We will leave no one to fight alone.

Here is a New Year's Resolution I hope you will share with me. In 2018, we will not only intensify the struggle against Trumpism, we will increase our efforts to spread the progressive vision in every corner of the land.
